Collaborating with AI in Google Workspace

This quick-start handbook provides foundational skills for writing effective prompts when using Gemini for Google Workspace. Gemini allows real-time collaboration with AI, enhancing productivity and creativity while maintaining privacy and security. The guide covers best practices for writing effective prompts, including persona, task, context, and format.

Key Concepts:

  • prompt writing
  • collaboration with AI
  • best practices
  • persona
  • task
  • context
  • format
  • planning business trips
  • researching places to eat
  • creating personalized itineraries
